title: Would definitely recommend!
body:
The Warring Kingdoms Azir figure. 

I was obviously obliged to by it _(being Azir)_

Ive bought a couple of figures before a lot of them as gifts, and they have all been pretty good _(especially the Gnar ones)_. 
But Azir looked kinda tacky in the images provided, with all the different colours and long bits that look ready to break off at any moment, so I had my doubts.

But I'm very pleased to say that the Azir figure is very high quality, the bits that look like they'd break are remarkably strong for their size, the material feels heavy and solid.

The shitty image i took doesn't do it justice, but it is very nicely done.

So if anyone was thinking of picking one up before the stocks run out, I can definitely reccomend it!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
